analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0x253dff06982d5685009c37295678d3c568dea3e5.sol:
	Contract DAEToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0x253dff06982d5685009c37295678d3c568dea3e5.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0x253dff06982d5685009c37295678d3c568dea3e5.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
